name: Protect the Potion
description:
CONTROLS:

A/D to move
W to Jump
Arrow keys to move potion

OBJECTIVE: 

Protect the potion at all costs and deliver it safely to the goal! Good luck!

Red blocks - DO NOT TOUCH
Yellow blocks - Springs

Credits:

Environmental assets - szadi art (https://szadiart.itch.io/)
Character art - Darcie Anderson 
Music - Tallbeard Studios (https://tallbeard.itch.io/music-loop-bundle)

Special thanks to Darcie and Connor for playtesting.
